ComicInfo.Summary:
The Burnouts have successfully trained Andy in the fine arts of getting wasted and smashing heads, just in time for them to fight off a herd of alien-possessed cows.
It's all fun and games until 1600 lbs of hamburger tries to murder you!

ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 3: Busted
